div.span: ATTENTION:
Gov. Tom Wolf has announced that Pennsylvania K-12 schools
will be closed
for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

em.strong: Letter to Families Regarding Special Education Services

div.span: 107 Concord Street Union City, PA 16438 | 814-438-3804

It is the mission of the Union City Area School District and the community to empower our students to be life-long learners by providing a safe and caring learning environment designed to meet the needs of each individual.

li.a: Welcome from the Director of Curriculum

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;text-align:center
div.strong: Did you know the following about Union City Area School District?

span.div:
1) UCASD Elementary teachers put together some friendly messages for our students to let them know they are missed. Check it out! - click here.
2) UCASD - Work packets in paper (also available online) were individualized and handed out for all students on March 27th.
3) As of April 24th, 18,636 meals have been prepared and distributed to our students since Monday, March 16th!

div.span: Senior Marshall VanTassel placed 5th in the 195 lb weight class at the Pennsylvania State Wrestling Tournament, Congratulations Marshall!

img.alt: Senior Marshall VanTassel placed 5th in the 195 lb weight class at the Pennsylvania State Wrestling Tournament, Congratulations Marshall!

div.span: Union City Elementary 1st graders celebrating Dr. Suess’ Birthday with their teachers Miss Stebick and Mrs. Smith.

img.alt: Union City Elementary 1st graders celebrating Dr. Suess’ Birthday with their teachers Miss Stebick and Mrs. Smith.

div.span: Valentines for Veterans was an event organized by a few Union City students. Many Union City Middle/ High School students made personal valentines then delivered them to the Soldiers and Sailors Home in Erie.

img.alt: Valentines for Veterans was an event organized by a few Union City students. Many Union City Middle/ High School students made personal valentines then delivered them to the Soldiers and Sailors Home in Erie.

div.span: The School Board congratulated the girls volleyball team on their Regional 3 Championship.

img.alt: The School Board congratulated the girls volleyball team on their Regional 3 Championship.

div.span: After school Cub Club dinner time!

img.alt: After school Cub Club dinner time!

div.span: Emily Eastman, Andrea Myer, and Brooke Reagle attended the District Band Festival on February 12-14 at Thiel College. All three ladies advanced to Region Band held at Indiana University on March 25-27.

img.alt: Emily Eastman, Andrea Myer, and Brooke Reagle attended the District Band Festival on February 12-14 at Thiel College. All three ladies advanced to Region Band held at Indiana University on March 25-27.
